actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for improvements in wife's and husband's insurance benefits.
short_title: Social Security Spouse Equity Act of 1991
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Spouse Equity Act of 1991 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide: (1) full benefits for disabled wives and husbands without regard to age; and (2) benefits for the spouse of a disabled beneficiary who is in need of substantially continuous aid and attendance without regard to the age of such spouse.

titles.title: Social Security Spouse Equity Act of 1991
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for improvements in wife's and husband's insurance benefits.
